acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._owner: The owner address for this contract.
params._uToken: The address of the token contract to stake and distribute as rewards.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to deposit.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRewardPerSecond(uint256).details: Only the owner can call this.

stake(uint256).details: Requires that there are rewards available (i.e., `s_amountRewarded < s_totalReward` and `s_rewardPerSecond > 0`).

params._amount: The amount of tokens to stake.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

returns._0: A copy of the users UserInfo struct.

withdraw(uint256).details: This updates the global and user-specific reward data first, then reduces the users stake.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.

DECIMAL_PRECISION().notice: A precision constant used to track rewards with integer math.

MINIMUM_DURATION().notice: The minimum duration (in seconds) a user must stake before they can withdraw.

claimRewards().notice: Claims all accumulated rewards for the caller and transfers them to the callers address.

constructor.notice: Constructs the Staking contract, initializing the token to be staked and setting the owner.

depositRewards(uint256).notice: Allows the owner to deposit additional tokens as rewards.

i_uToken().notice: Reference to the token that users stake and that is also used for rewards.

s_accumulatedRewardPerUnitStaked().notice: Accumulated rewards per unit staked, used in distributing rewards proportionally among stakers.

s_amountRewarded().notice: The total amount of reward tokens that have been distributed so far.

s_lastRewardTimestamp().notice: The last timestamp when the global reward state was updated.

s_rewardPerSecond().notice: The rate at which rewards are minted, per second (scaled with DECIMAL_PRECISION).

s_totalReward().notice: The total amount of tokens set aside for rewards.

s_totalStaked().notice: The total amount of tokens staked across all users.

setRewardPerSecond(uint256).notice: Sets the reward-per-second rate at which tokens are distributed.

stake(uint256).notice: Stakes `_amount` of tokens on behalf of the caller.

userInfo(address).notice: Retrieves a users staking information, including staked amount and accrued rewards.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws `_amount` of tokens for the caller, assuming the minimum staking duration has passed.
